          <title>
            <string language="en">Helmholtz coils</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Helmholtz Spulen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Enroulements de Helmholtz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Bobinas de Helmholtz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Bobine di Helmholtz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πηνία Helmholtz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Bobinas de Helmholtz</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a pair of Helmholtz coils which can be used to produce a uniform magnetic field.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">helmholtz coils</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic field</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic flux</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">turns</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung stellt dar, daß ein Paar 
Helmholtz Spulen, welches verwendet werden kann, um ein konstantes 
magnetisches zu produzieren, auffangen Sie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre une paire 
d'enroulements de Helmholtz ce qui peut être employé pour produire 
un champ magnétique uniforme.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra um par de bobinas de 
Helmholtz qual pode ser usado produzir um campo magnético uniforme.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra un accoppiamento 
delle bobine di Helmholtz quale può essere usato per produrre un 
campo magnetico dell'uniforme.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει ένα ζευγάρι των πηνίων 
Helmholtz που μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί για να παραγάγει ένα 
ομοιόμορφο μαγνητικό πεδίο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra un par de las bobinas 
de Helmholtz cuál se puede utilizar para producir un campo magnético
uniforme.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">helmholtz Spulen</string>
